textBeforeTable: Z Y | X | W | V | U | T | S | R | Q | P | O | N | M | L | K | J | I | H | G | F | E | D | C | B | A | Not sure who you’re looking for? Each research department has a list of faculty members. You can also find faculty members by fields of expertise, disease research, or scientific technologies on our Research Areas page. To find out more about the research and background of one of our faculty members, use the directory below. Clicking on one of the letters will bring up a list of all faculty members whose last name begins with that letter. Selecting a name will take you to a page describing that faculty member’s research, his or her position at Scripps Research, as well as educational background, selected research publications, and contact information.
